home.title: Home
home.subtitle: Example i18n App!
home.description: This is an example React Native application demonstrating how to implement internationalization (i18n) using react-i18next. The app allows users to switch between different languages for a more localized experience.
home.exploringLanguagesDescription: Click on country flags to explore the app's content in different languages.

i18n.title: Internationalization with i18next
i18n.description: Uses react-i18next for language management, allowing the app to be localized for different languages.

persistent.title: Persistent Language Selection
persistent.description: Uses AsyncStorage to persistently store the user's preferred language, providing a consistent experience across app restarts.

fallback.title: Language Fallback
fallback.description: Defaults to the device's language if no language preference is saved.

switching.title: Easy Language Switching
switching.description: Users can switch languages by tapping on country flags.

account.title: Account
account.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete your account? This action cannot be undone.

signOut.title: Sign Out
signOut.message: Are you sure you want to sign out?

passwordReset.title: Reset password
passwordReset.description: Enter your email address. We will send you instructions to reset your password.
passwordReset.successMessage: Check your email to reset your password
passwordReset.emailRequired: Please enter a valid email address
passwordReset.genericError: An error occurred while sending the email

available.title: Update available
available.message: A new version of the app is available with improvements and fixes. Would you like to update now?

downloading.title: Downloading...
downloading.message: We're downloading the update. This might take a few minutes...

restarting.title: Restarting...
restarting.message: The app will restart in a moment to apply the update.

error.title: Update error
error.message: An error occurred during the update: {{error}}

noUpdates.title: App up to date
noUpdates.message: You're already using the latest version of the app.

checkError.message: Unable to check for updates. Please verify your internet connection and try again.

downloadError.message: Unable to download the update. Please try again later.

manual.title: App updates
manual.description: Manually check if app updates are available. Updates are usually checked automatically at startup.
manual.available: A new version of the app is available.
manual.info: Over-the-air updates allow you to receive new features without having to download the app from the store.

accounts.title: Accounts
accounts.goalProgress: Still {{amount}} to complete the goal of {{symbol}} {{target}}

final.title: Start Building Today
final.description: You're all set to create your next great app. Get started now and save weeks of development time!

editScreen.codePrompt: Open up the code for this screen:
editScreen.changePrompt: Change any of the text, save the file, and your app will automatically update.
editScreen.troubleshoot: Tap here if your app doesn't automatically update after making changes

budgets.title: Budgets
budgets.description: Set your budget and track expenses to reach your goals

profile.name: Name
profile.finalDeleteConfirmMessage:
This action is irreversible and will permanently delete:

• All your accounts and transactions
• All budget data and goals
• All recurring payment rules
• Your entire profile

Are you absolutely sure?
profile.accountDeletedMessage: Your account and all associated data have been permanently deleted.
profile.errorDeletingAccount: Unable to delete account. Please try again or contact support.
profile.currencyUpdatedMessage: Currency has been changed to {{currency}}, the app will restart in a moment to apply the new currency.
profile.iconUpdatedMessage: To apply the new icon, you need to restart the app.
profile.errorChangingCurrency: Unable to change currency. Please try again.
profile.errorChangingIcon: Unable to change icon. Please try again.

name.title: NEW ACCOUNT
name.prompt: Assign a name for your account

summary.title: NEW ACCOUNT
summary.defaultAccountDesc: Set this account as preselected when creating a new transaction
summary.savingsAccountDesc: Enabling this setting will allow you to add a savings goal

errors.accountNotAvailable: Selected account not available. Try again or select another account.
errors.transferAccountNotAvailable: Destination account not available. Try again or select another account.
errors.sameAccount: Source and destination accounts must be different
errors.amountMustBePositive: Amount must be greater than zero
errors.selectTransferAccountError: Select a destination account for the transfer
errors.unsupportedTransactionType: Transaction type not supported for installments
errors.createInstallmentError: An error occurred while creating the installment transaction. Verify that the account exists.
errors.createTransactionError: Error creating {{type}}. Verify that the accounts exist.
errors.createRecurringError: An error occurred while creating the recurring transaction. Verify that the account exists.
errors.saveTransactionError: An error occurred while saving the transaction
